lines.text: Embrace nothing. If you meet the Buddha, kill the Buddha. If you meet your father, kill your father. Only live your life as it is, not bound to anything.

[cracks open a beer and takes a swig]
Goddamn it, this one's hot. Goku, get me another beer.
Get your own beer, jerkoff!
Okay, you're gonna get me another beer or I'm gonna take this can and shove it up your whiney little ass! You got that?
You just try and see what happens, ya shithead!
Oh, yeah?
You're just looking for an excuse to touch my ass, aren't you?

[sighs]
Please ...
You little fag! Don't project your fantasies on me!
All right, that's it! Pull over, I'm taking him out!
Your little unrequited love affair is starting to get on my nerves! Get a room!
[Gojyo and Goku fall silent]
Good move there, uh, Sanzo.
I thought so, thanks.
Oh, my, awful quiet back there guys. Are you two making out?
Shut up, Hakkai.
Yeah, shut up.
Calling it something else won't change what it is.
He gave me something that day. Something I wanted to protect. And when it was taken from me, I learned how small I was. I vowed never again to care for someone so much, I couldn't bear to lose them.
Life is about the voyage, not the destination.
Why do you keep fighting if you have nothing at stake here? Why?
God, dude. What do you keep talking about? I fight for myself. Me. That's reason enough to take you down. Eat dirt!
Damnit! Monkey, go buy me a pack of Cigarettes.
Stupid monkey, get your own food.
Leave me alone, you pervy water sprit!

[pulls out gun and start shoting]
Will you both shut the hell up?
Oh, dear!
Miaow!
Oh, great, the carnival's in town.
Oh, yeah. I'd like to show a couple of those little carnival hotties what kind of action's going on under my big top.

[blows a whistle]
Too much information!
The hotel's booked, preacher-man. But I had the foresight to book a couple of vacant singles, so you can say thank you now.
Thank you now.
Sweetheart, when it comes to my women, I'm picky.
[a demon flies into the hall through Goku's closed door]
Are you all right, Goku?

[sleepily]
Wha? I'm fine. I had the weirdest dream.
More like a nightmare, my friend.
He did this in his sleep? That's bullshit.
I'm sorry, I can't concentrate. Not with those two morons in the back.

[happily]
I'm trying to ignore them!
Really? How's it going?
Not so good.
Pardon me, goddess, but why did you send the chosen gour on an earth bound path? Their journey west would be far faster if you would have allowed them heavenly travel.

Geographical arrival is not the only goal. Currently they are painfully lacking in both the ability and the solidarity that will be necessary for them to accomplish our true goal. They are not only traveling to a physical destination, but a spiritual one as well.
Of course. I'm sorry, I should not have doubted your methods.
I'm kidding. It's just that it's much more interesting this way, don't you think?

[laughing]
You, a holy man? Yeah, right!

[laughing, mimicking Yoh]
I cannot tell you what this means to me. Do no hesitate to call my name!

[laughing]
You know what this means, don't you?
[the three become very serious]
He doesn't know you very well.
[they break into laughter again]

[analyzing their foe]
So, whadda ya think, Goku?
Seems like an asshole and he's got bad hair. I say minus twenty points.
Take off another fifteen. His clothes are lame and he smells.

[laughing until he realizes they're talking about him]
Huh? How dare you! How dare you mock me!
Oh! Dude! Bad teeth! Take off another five!
[the demon throws his ax at Gojyo and misses]
Bad aim. That's another ten.
And you're not all that bright either. Take away another forty-five.
Nice shot.
With that many points, he's definitely out of the game.
Everybody becomes closer to Buddha when they stop breathing. It's harder to be close while you still are.
You jerks damage my reputation daily.
So ya wanna see if the carpet matches the drapes, do ya?
Hey! That is not on the menu!
Jiroushin, do you know why we, the gods, exist in heaven? It is not to look down on them, but to watch over them. To watch over those that were born to live.
Man, this giant shitpile ain't easy to break into. It's tough.
I don't think I like them.
That isn't good.
They didn't drive all this way just to see us, did they?
I'm not so sure that truck is road worthy.

[laughs]
How much you wanna bet they had to push that thing all the way here?
What foolishness.
So you see, it's not so easy to kill gods.
Huh. How very god-like of you. Wow. To demonstrate your great power, then expect us to hand over the scriptures to you.
Why don't you kneel, kneel before me now.
No, thank you.
[fires a shot at Homrua's head]
Have faith only in what you see with your own eyes, feel with your own heart, and prove with your own strength. That is something that I have always admired about you.
Innocent eyes, pure intentions, but this boy is also a heretic, just like me. Saiten taisen, Son Goku!
[three shots fire]
Will you two shut up? Do you wanna die?
[three more shots fire]
Now if you are quite finished, will you sit down?
But, Sanzo!
This monkey...
Shut up!
Hey, isn't that a monk's robe he's got on?
But there are still some spring rolls left!
Beer!
Yes, yes, I know. But if we don't hurry, Sanzo really will shoot us.
Spring rolls!
Beer!
Slowpokes!
[fires two shots]
It's better to be free on earth than slaves in the heavens.
He may not look it, but he's a very benevolent god.
I fear peace has made the gods complacent.
I know, I have an idea. How about I lay a bunch of blankets on the floor for you guys and you can all sleep together.
Sleep together?
Would you stop acting like a child?
I am a child, doofus!

[after opening the door and finding Goku pinned under Gojyo on the bed]
Oh, sorry. I'll just leave this right here.
[leaves and shuts the door]
I swear, I didn't see anything. Enjoy your stay.
Be honest with me fellas, does this look bad?
I forgot who it was who said monotony could kill a man. Someone from the lower world, I believe. But here death doesn't even exist. Your brain melts away at room temperature for eternity.
Now what's got your panties in a wad?
After all, I only work as much as I'm paid to.
Well, it sure does look like Sanzo needs some anger management.
If you don't move your ass I'll show you anger management.
Moron. That's what you get for pausing in battle to make pretty speeches.
Well, that certainly is a first, we're all in agreement for once.
And who knows? You and your little band of heroes maybe be able to save him.
This is the way it should be. You should have been able to hear Kougaji's soul cry out. That's why you are the only ones who can save him. I cannot. I cannot hear the voices, even if I wanted.
I'm not sleeping tonight unless there's a woman beside me.
I'm exhausted. I can't even muster enough energy to punch Goku.
That would piss me off if I weren't so damn hungry.
It's such an eerie feeling, though. How he actually seems to anticipate our every move.
That's not hard with these two.
What did you say?
Hey, Sanzo!
Hm?
Lend me a smoke, will ya?
No way.
Don't be a Scrooge! I gotta have my fix, man!
If memory serves me correctly, I seem to recall someone saying my smokes tasted like shit.
I need nicotine right now. Cough 'em up!
Let go of me, that is if you wanna live, you red-haired fairy.

[screams]
I need nicotine!
Lesser men have tried and greater men have failed.
I'll be damned. He's sleeping with eyes open.
[grabs Goku and starts shaking him]
That's just too goddamned creepy!
Shut up or I'll kill you!
That's too weird. Sanzo shouts in his sleep.
I left the monkey back in the forest, if you must know.
That lady called Hakkai Gonou. I wonder, that means they were school makes or something!
You can be so naive sometimes, Goku. They were a little more that that. I think ol' one eye was getting some nun action, if you ...
Enough!
[smacks Goku and Gojyo with his fan]
If you want something to speculate about, why don't you figure out where we're going to sleep tonight?
Destroying that which you hate will not create the world you long for, I promise.
So now we're stealing from monkeys. That's so pathetic.
You monks aren't more moral than us. You just rationalize much better.
I wish that stupid monkey would just shut the hell up.
Whoo-hee, he's giving me a pounding headache.
Hey, come one, bring on the booze!
Come to think of it, I've never actually seen Hakkai drunk before.
We might have underestimated him.
What's wrong, Goldilocks? You look woozy. That all you got?
[pauses]
I didn't hurt your feelings, did I, pretty boy?
Heh, heh, heh, heh ...
S-Sanzo?
You dumb bastard. You actually have the gall to mock me, do you? Maten ...

[clamps his hand over Sanzo's mouth]
Please! Don't you think unleashing a scripture that controls heaven and earth is a little severe?
Hey, wake up. Your family's here to see you.
Damn it to hell, these monkeys sure are a pain in the ass.
I resent that!
You resemble that.
Aww, look, back with his own kind.
Consume wine, don't let the wine consume you.
If this place were deep inside the earth, I would not yearn for a sun I never knew.
Your hair, it looks just like the sun.
The sun?
[Goku pulls Konzen's hair, pulling out several strands]

[sheepish smile]
Sorry.
What the hell did you do that for, ya damn monkey? Don't you know who I am?
[starts beating up Goku]
Ah! I didn't mean to! I said I was sorry!
Egan, he's so charming and they get along so well, don't you think? I think we'll keep him
[pauses]
with us here.
What in the name of the heavens are you saying, Merciful Goddess? You've never kept so much as a houseplant without killing it!
Silence! Did I say *I* was going to keep him?
Huh?
He shall remain in the care of my nephew, Konzen.
Huh? Why you worthless old hag!
This is the Merciful Goddess's mandate. Now go have fun with your new pet. Go on, run along.
[to herself]
Hair like the sun. What a truly perfect pick up line. The sun.
Flowers are great, women are better, but I tell you, a glass of good rice wine is just heavenly.
Merciful, my ass! She's dumping all her problems on me!
I will never grow up, not if it means becoming like you.
That damn monkey's nothing but a constant distraction. Assign him to someone else, will you please?
When you're having so much fun?
Don't you have anything better to do than torture me?
And you make much a wonderful daddy.
Real funny.
Things that never change are so lame.
So come on, guys, if you've been wanting a piece of me, here's your chance.
[laughs]
You just had to rile them up, didn't you?
Hey, leggo my egg roll.
Yeah, Sanzo, have you seen her?
Why are you asking me?
Well, she is your play pal, isn't she?

[puts the barrel of the banishing gun under Gojyo's chin]
Please continue.
Mommy.
Die, damn you!
Tell me, why is this brat still around?
Put down the gun.
Since we were here, I figured we would enjoy the festival.
Unnhhhhhh, who would be making a racket this early?
It's noon already, moron.
What? You mean I missed breakfast?
People die when they die.
I never knew you had such a playful side to you, monk.
Look, Sanzo, you're gonna totally look like and old man if you're tense all the time. You should learn to relax a little bit. It wouldn't kill ya.
I feel like the mouse the cat plays with before it's going to kill it.
Either they're really confident, really polite, or really bored.
I'm gonna go out on a limb here and say all of the above.
Or this could be their way of flirting with one of us.
I'll be, so the chimp can read, can he?
Tell me, are you and Kenren sharing the same stylist?
Yes, and I think the fashion is bound to catch on eventually!
Don't I look more rugged?

Destroying this world to make way for a new one, that is why I am here. But still, I can't help but wonder if the universe we create will be any better. But it's useless to second-guess. I made my choice a long time ago and there's no deviating from this path once I've set upon it. Yes, I chose to put all my faith in Homura then, when I saw the horrible things we'd done to you, in the name of heaven.
Holy shit, they're gods.
I really hate these guys.
I really hate guys like you. So willing to lay down your lives for some self-serving despot, yet completely unable to lift a finger to stand up for yourselves.
Don't expect me to chant any sutras for you if you croak.
Yes, sir. I'd sure hate for you to put yourself out, or anything.
Will you continue to be the little tyke's shining sun, Sanzo?
Monkeys need to be trained.
You look a little winded. You should cut back on those cigarettes.
You're one to talk.
God? Don't you know? God is dead!
Regrets are just a way for the foolish and the guilty to pass the time.
I'm no longer a god; I'm a demon from hell.
You look a little winded. You should cut back on those cigarettes.
You're one to talk.
He gave me something that day. Something I wanted to protect. And when it was taken from me, I learned how small I was. I vowed never again to care for someone so much, I could bear to lose them.
I 'm not the world's biggest fan, no.
Nice dodge, Chakra boy.
By the way, I'm willing to bet I'm the first guy you've ever held in your arms.
That's right, never again.
I don't get it, but... I do.
Okay, I'll stay. But I want you to know that I reserve the right to walk at any time I deem fit.
Just take me with you.
Ladies, ladies, please.
Without the limitor he's reverted to his original form. The creature conceived in a giant stone where the earthly auras gather. The great sage, Goku.
I got it. Nothing is impossible for me.
[childish chanting over Hakkai and Jiroushin's dialogue]
Nothing is impossible for me. I'm a goddess, I can do whatever I want to! Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Oohhkaaay... Are goddesses always this sure of themselves?
Oh, boy. Just try working for one.
Such an unruly band of misfits. You know, they might just make it after all.
I'm crashing. Anyone wakes me up, cut their nuts off.

[short laugh]
Go to sleep.
When they get like this, I usually just like to go to my own happy place.
Are you really able to tune them out?
Mmmm, nope.
All right! Who wants a piece of me? Listen to me, you bunch of do-gooders! Prepare to meet your doom!
Oh, my, he sure is good at taming wild animals.
Hello!
What's up?
I was wondering, if you're not doing anything, would you consider maybe being my opponent? If you want to.
Why, I would be honored.
This one's for my mother!

[assessing the enemy from Sanzo's shoulders]
Oh what's the big deal? I kicked this guy's ass with no problem.
Listen ...
Okay.
What do you think you're doing?
I'm sitting.
Get off.
Weanie.
Oh boy are you gonna get it.
Pardon me, but don't these guys know they're supposed to be our enemies?
Yeah, so what do you call that thing on your shoulders, huh?
I ain't dyin'. And I tell ya, I super hate to lose.
Don't say super.
What should I say? Hella hate?
You said it was easy to find the crevices of my heart. Well, my heart isn't big enough for crevices.
How every ounce of my being despises you.
Sheesh. I thought one Goku was bad enough.
You should think of all of the trouble they'll cause for other folks.
Besides, illegal copies are an infringement of copyright.
We wouldn't be on this journey unless we were all a bunch of idiots.
I'm so stuffed!

[laughs]
I'd never thought I'd live to hear those world pass through your lips, Goku.
For your information, this is the one and only time I take a man to bed, got it?
You damn Buddha thumper.
Well, he did go without eating for about 500 years, so his body must be trying to make up for it.

Murder doesn't necessarily mean evil, right? The world being what it is, a lot of people out there deserve to die, don't they? But those who do take it upone themselves to kill others have to be prepared to have others try to kill them as well. And that's what they call the law of Karma, my friends. That's why good or bad, the only ones who are going to be left standing are the ones with the strongest wills to survive.
The gods do not save anyone. You alone are responsible for saving your life.
I don't chant sutras for the dead, you got that?
Though I did spend some time with a tall, dysfunctional blond, an impulsive, excitable little airhead, and I had an emotionally unstable head case with a pretty face shack up with me for a while.
I wouldn't go on a trip with you fools if you paid me.
What makes you think that there is only one path to take?
Why would a demon com all that way just to eat a Sanzo? Are Sanzos that tasty?
Now don't you go getting any funny ideas, hear me?
I seem to recall the spider woman saying something about eating holy monks. Interesting. Apparently a healthy serving of monks helps you live longer.
So eating a high ranking monk like a Sanzo is as good as eating your fruits and vegetables when you're a demon, is that it?
You've got to be shitting me.
Being a Sanzo doesn't necessarily make you as strong as a demon. He was probably a proper, serious, ordinary, very devout Sanzo.
Oh, right, gotcha.
What do you mean by that?
What's precious to you? You should never let go of what's precious to you, your highness.

[gasps in pain after being kicked by Goku]
Ow, that hurt. What'd you do that for?
Berate me. Go ahead and strike me with your little paper fan. That's what the Sanzo priest I know would do.

[voice over]
Sanzo's rage vanished instantly. The Sanzo priest was really no match for the monkey's wit.
Pull yourself together, you stupid monkey.

[chuckling]
Oh, man.
What are you giggling about?

[still chuckling]
I'm not giggling.
You're so creepy.
I think Sanzo's starting to warm up a little.
He can be twisted at times, but
[lisping]
it's kinda nice to see his feminine side.
Your friends are weird.
Come, don't be shy. Let's get a look at that pretty little face of yours.
[chuckling, he removes the hood to reveal Hakkai]
Huh?
Don't tell me you didn't see this one coming. Oh, well. So how 'bout it tall, dark, handsome, and horrible? I do hope you're into the rough stuff.
You, dying of hunger? That's I'd like to see.
What's wrong, Goku?
[Goku faints]
Goku!
I'll go get you some food right away! Just hold on! Don't die on me monkey.
[Goku sits up happily]
In that case, I'll take some pot stickers.
[Gojyo smacks him]
Wanna wrestle?
Non-perishables go there.
Aye-aye, Miss President.
And please stop calling me that.
Hey guys!
No, it can't be.
If it itsn't Sanzo's little pet. Look at Sanzo has a little pet.
Peeve. Pet peeve. I hate her.
[laughing]
Mia, mia, mia!
What, what, what?
[repeated multiple times]
Did you say something?
That wasn't you?
Which means that babies must be sleeping in the engine!
That's the stupidest thing ...
What a persistent little f...
I envy you man. Why don't the chicks pursue me like this, Sanzo?
I will kill you.
Okay, bald Sanzo, here I come!
Goku, you fight her.
Oh, kick ass! Why'd you choose me?
Makes sense. She's your size.
But Hakkai's the one who's good with children.
No, no! Gojyo's the one that's good with women.
Yeah, but she's, she's Sanzo's girlfriend.
You're askin' for it.

[looking at the sunset]
It's more beautiful than a meat bun!
That's quite an endorsement.
Come to think of it, we're always heading towards the setting sun, aren't we?
[sigh]
Ah, sweet youth!

[bursts out laughing]
Ah sweet youth!
[keeps laughing]
It wasn't that bad, now was it?
Boy we sure did leave a mess.
And trash pickup isn't until Thursday.
It looks like a giant turd.
You are so grossing me out, you know that?

I don't understand you at all. Not in the least. I know that the Buddha extols the heavenly virtues of preserving all life, but you not only risked your own life to save me from that raging river, but you took me in a kept me at your side.
It was because of the sound of your voice.
Huh?
You called out to me, repeatedly. You called out so many times, I had never seen such will in a child before.
I cried out to him, and he heard me.
You were so noisy I had to take you with me. You were driving me crazy.
I'm sorry, I don't quite understand.
One day, Kouryu, you will hear a voice call out to you. Then you will understand.
If I ever did heard that voice, I would take him in, too. I would teach him discipline and obedience with my fan.
All these vegatables are giving me gas.
Well, they're Buddists and they're monks... and if you think about farting I'll kill you.

[running and holding Hakkai's leg for protection]
You said Sanzo would be forgiving, but he's not.
That's why I added to probably.
